name: Manan Batra
title: Frontend Developer
summary: Frontend Developer specializing in React JS, with experience designing and delivering responsive, user-focused web applications that improve usability and engagement. Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and modern UI frameworks. Skilled in building visually engaging interfaces, improving user experience through performance optimizations, and ensuring seamless functionality across devices. Demonstrated ability to collaborate in team environments, implement best coding practices, and deliver high-quality solutions that drive user engagement and satisfaction. Experienced in resolving technical challenges, collaborating in cross-functional teams, and consistently delivering projects on time while adapting to fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
highlights: Developed and deployed a full-stack Grievance Assistant with ticket-based tracking and AI analytics, improving efficiency by 25%.
Automated weekly reporting with Selenium and cron jobs, reducing manual effort by 80%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments and developed a QR-based event system.

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer Intern
highlights: Collaborated with the core product team to design and develop responsive UIs across User, Client, and Admin applications, reducing user wait times by 20–30% through real-time updates and optimized flows.
Gained hands-on experience with React.js and modern frontend libraries, building scalable, reusable components in a component-driven architecture.
Worked with backend APIs to improve state management, delivering a smoother and more seamless user experience across applications.

experience.title: Subject Matter Expert
highlights: Delivered 200+ academic solutions across Computer Science subjects, improving student comprehension by 25%.
Created and reviewed 100+ structured study materials aligned with curriculum standards.
Increased course satisfaction ratings by 30% and supported higher completion rates through clear explanations.

projects.name: ViewTube
projects.description: A YouTube clone featuring video streaming with API integration and data fetching, resulting in 30% faster load times and improved user retention by 40%. Developed responsive UI with Tailwind CSS, ensuring accessibility compliance.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed and deployed a high-performance movie recommendation API, cutting server response time by 50% through backend optimizations. Developed advanced predictive models that improved recommendation accuracy by 30%.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience. Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive look.
